title: Revert to Version 24

requirements.text: Restore the complete application state to Version 24, reverting all changes made in Versions 25, 26, 27, and 28
acceptanceCriteria: All backend code matches Version 24 state
All frontend code matches Version 24 state
No artifacts from Versions 25-28 remain in the codebase

constraints: Must preserve Version 24 code exactly as it existed
Do not introduce any new features or modifications during revert
nonGoals: Keeping any features added in Versions 25-28
Selective cherry-picking of changes from later versions
